alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 11:18AM CDT until November 05 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hancock County in southern Mississippi... * Until noon CDT. * At 1117 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Diamondhead, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 8 and 15. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
